Sample.Title: HN1

Channel.Extract-Protocol: Tissue was homogenized in TRIzol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA) and RNA extracted using the RNeasy Lipid Tissue Mini Kit (Qiagen) RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols

Sample.Data-Processing: Quality control was performed by Fastqc Perform trimming by trimmomatic, allign the sequence using Hisat2 with Ensembl reference and read count with Hiseq Genes are filtered to retain those with count per millon (CPM) greather than 1 in more than 50% samples The library size is normalized using count per million (CPM) and tthen the data is log2 transformed with prior count 1. Genome_build: GRCh38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of log2CPM of the original count for filtered genes and all samples Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of raw counts for all genes and samples

Sample.Data-Processing: Quality control was performed by Fastqc Perform trimming by trimmomatic, allign the sequence using Hisat2 with Ensembl reference and read count with Hiseq Genes are filtered to retain those with count per millon (CPM) greather than 1 in more than 50% samples The library size is normalized using count per million (CPM) and tthen the data is log2 transformed with prior count 1. Genome_build: GRCh38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of log2CPM of the original count for filtered genes and all samples Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of raw counts for all genes and samples

Sample.Data-Processing: Quality control was performed by Fastqc Perform trimming by trimmomatic, allign the sequence using Hisat2 with Ensembl reference and read count with Hiseq Genes are filtered to retain those with count per millon (CPM) greather than 1 in more than 50% samples The library size is normalized using count per million (CPM) and tthen the data is log2 transformed with prior count 1. Genome_build: GRCh38 Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of log2CPM of the original count for filtered genes and all samples Supplementary_files_format_and_content: comma-separated file of raw counts for all genes and samples

Series.Title: Transcriptional alterations in dorsolateral prefrontal cortex and nucleus accumbens implicate neuroinflammation and synaptic remodeling in opioid use disorder
Series.Summary: Transcriptional alterations in dorsolateral prefrontal cortex and nucleus accumbens implicate neuroinflammation and synaptic remodeling in opioid use disorder. Transcriptomic profile of 20 control subjects and 20 OUD subjects in brain region DLPFC and NAC
Series.Overall-Design: Compare transcriptomic profile of 20 control subjects and 20 OUD subjects in brain region DLPFC and NAC
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
